key_points.point: Can wear them for long hours

verdict: Most users find the shoes comfortable, particularly due to their lightweight design and cushioning. Some mentioned softness of the sole.
The fit is inconsistent. Some users find the shoes to be a perfect fit, while others recommend ordering a size up due to the shoes running small or tight. Broad feet might experience tightness.

key_points.point: Strips on sole have started coming out
Edge repaired with glue and small torn

verdict: Several users have reported issues with the durability of the shoes, including the sole wearing off and the product getting damaged within a short period. Some suspect a lack of authenticity.

key_points.point: Bottom rubber line cushion started to wear off
Strips on sole have started coming out

verdict: While some users appreciate the sole's grip and quality, others have experienced issues with the sole wearing off quickly or making noise.
The shoes provide good support, especially for walking.
